name: Ancient Void Dragon
description: The Ancient Void Dragon is a gargantuan creature steeped in chaos and fear, showcasing exceptional physical attributes with a striking presence in combat. Its body reflects a majestic yet terrifying aspect of the void, embodying its mastery of the realms beyond reality.
memorable: The dragon’s death triggers a powerful explosion, the 'Collapsing Star', causing immense damage and potentially ejecting creatures to other planes, making encounters with it profoundly impactful.
goals: To dominate its surroundings, represent chaos, and assert its power over others.
relations: Other dragons might serve it or come from its lair, as well as cosmic entities drawn to the chaotic energies it embodies.
environment: Typically found in chaotic locales or areas associated with the void, such as abandoned ruins of ancient civilizations.
strengths: Exceptional Strength and Constitution make it a powerful combatant, along with significant immunities to cold damage and mental effects.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity may leave it open to certain ranged attacks and tactically vulnerable situations.
attacks: The Ancient Void Dragon's attacks include a chilling 'Bite' that does both piercing and cold damage, slashing 'Claws', and a devastating 'Tail' strike. It also employs fearsome breath attacks.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Collapsing Star' explosion upon death, dealing substantial bludgeoning and cold damage to nearby creatures and causing chaotic effects on the battlefield.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a passive Perception score of 26, showcasing exceptional awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Arcana and History, both at +18, reflecting its deep knowledge of cosmic phenomena.
additional_information: Immune to cold damage and condition immunities to charm and fright.
Can manipulate reality with 'Void Twist', redirecting attacks to other targets.
Possesses powerful breath weapons, including 'Gravitic Breath' and 'Stellar Breath', that cause large area damage.
'Aura of Madness' ability can induce madness in nearby creatures.
Expert Void Traveler, able to traverse the void effortlessly without needing sustenance.
